name: vk_atm_withdraw_reconciliation
description: This table is used to reconcile ATM withdrawal transactions by comparing data from different sources.

columns.name: vikki_from_account_number
columns.description: The account number from which the withdrawal was made.

columns.name: vikki_amount
columns.description: The amount of money withdrawn in the transaction.

columns.name: vikki_transaction_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the withdrawal transaction occurred.

columns.name: vikki_currency
columns.description: The currency in which the transaction was made.

columns.name: vikki_external_reference_id
columns.description: An external reference identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: vikki_transaction_id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: vikki_channel
columns.description: The channel through which the transaction was made (e.g., ATM, online).

columns.name: vikki_tid
columns.description: The identifier for the ATM terminal used for the transaction.

columns.name: vikki_from_bank_name
columns.description: The name of the bank from which the withdrawal was made.

columns.name: vikki_posting_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction was recorded in the system.

columns.name: vikki_source_account_name
columns.description: The name associated with the source account number.

columns.name: vikki_narrative
columns.description: A narrative or description of the transaction.

columns.name: vikki_rtf_posting_type
columns.description: The type of posting related to the transaction.

columns.name: vikki_rtf_type
columns.description: The classification of the RTF (Real-Time Funds) transaction.

columns.name: vikki_auth_code
columns.description: The authorization code for the transaction.

columns.name: vikki_from_cif_number
columns.description: The Customer Information File number associated with the source account.

columns.name: hdb_channel_id
columns.description: The identifier for the channel used in the HDB system.

columns.name: hdb_from_cif_number
columns.description: The Customer Information File number in the HDB system.

columns.name: hdb_from_account_number
columns.description: The account number in the HDB system from which the withdrawal was made.

columns.name: hdb_account_type
columns.description: The type of account in the HDB system.

columns.name: hdb_amount
columns.description: The amount of money involved in the transaction in the HDB system.

columns.name: hdb_currency
columns.description: The currency used in the transaction in the HDB system.

columns.name: hdb_transaction_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the transaction in the HDB system.

columns.name: hdb_rrn
columns.description: The retrieval reference number for the transaction in the HDB system.

columns.name: hdb_tid
columns.description: The terminal identifier in the HDB system.

columns.name: hdb_external_reference_id
columns.description: An external reference identifier in the HDB system.

columns.name: reconciliation_result
columns.description: The result of the reconciliation process for the transaction.

columns.name: to_bank_name
columns.description: The name of the bank to which the funds were transferred.

columns.name: transaction_direction
columns.description: The direction of the transaction (e.g., debit, credit).

columns.name: id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the record in the table.

columns.name: sym_run_date
columns.description: The date when the synchronization or reconciliation run was executed.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: The timestamp when the record was last updated.
